data.text: @amybisson I believe the thinking is taking acetaminophen or ibuprofen before could potentially tamp down the immune response from the vaccine. That's E's pediatrician's recommendation for her shots now as well; they recommend you wait until after and only take if definitely needed.

@amybisson I feel like they're doing a very poor job communicating before/during/after info. They need to get pediatricians out there communicating, they're used to giving all this info regarding vaccinations!

@lva1113 Oh boy - I've also just read that one should NOT take aceteminophen or iburprophen before the COVID vaccine (sounded like it was okay afterwards, but I'll be watching that). Yeah, made sure my shingrix was done in early Jan.
